clinical_study.brief_title: SAFETIM-needs : Exploring Adolescent's and Parent's Needs During Transition in French CF Centers
clinical_study.official_title: SAFETIM Besoins: Suivi Des Adolescents Des Familles et Des Equipes Pour Une Transition Idéale en Mucoviscidose Etude Des Besoins Adolescents et Parent Avant après Transition

brief_summary.textblock: prospective multicentric study protocol in french CF center, exploring adolescent avec parents needs during transition from pediatric CF center to adult CF center

detailed_description.textblock:
Adolescent's and parent's needs will be studied, before the transition and their experiences of transition, in order to propose organizational national recommendations semi structured interview with adolescents and parents separately, before and after transition.
semi structured interviews will be conducted twice for each (adolescent and parents), the first in the 6 months before transition and the second in the 6 months after transition.
After their verbatims will be analyzed and the optimal organisation will be determined for the transition based according to their point of view.
At the end, the data from this study will be matched with data collected in a former study from care givers practices during transition in the french CF centers.

primary_outcome.measure: Identify CF adolescents and their parents needs before transition
primary_outcome.time_frame: During their systematic appointment at the CF center, patients will have one individual interview during the year before transition. Interviews will be analyzed after all interviews will have been performed.

primary_outcome.measure: Identify CF adolescents and their parents experience after transition
primary_outcome.time_frame: During their systematic appointment at the CF center, patients will have one individual interview during the year after transition. Interviews will be analyzed after all interviews will have been performed.

secondary_outcome.measure: What do they need, to feel safe before transition
secondary_outcome.time_frame: During their systematic appointment at the CF center, patients and parents will have one individual interview during the year before transition. Interviews will be analyzed after all interviews will have been performed

secondary_outcome.measure: Do these needs of CFadolescent and their parents taken into account in the transition procedures
secondary_outcome.time_frame: During their systematic appointment at the CF center, patients and parents will have one individual interview during the year after transition. Interviews will be analyzed after all interviews will have been performed
secondary_outcome.description: Do the procedures take into account the needs of patients and parents

secondary_outcome.measure: Which factors influence quality of transition other than TPE dimension.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Interviews will be analyzed after an average of one year after the last interviews will have been performed, both outcome will be matched
secondary_outcome.description: Satisfaction level of Patients and Family After Transition

secondary_outcome.measure: Do the resources implemented by the CRCM teams during the adolescent-adult transition matched with adolescents and parents needs and expectations
secondary_outcome.time_frame: comparison between the results with health care practices one year after the last interview will be performed
secondary_outcome.description: Identifying key points of the patient's personalized transition, the timing and personalization of the health care course during the transition

arm_group.arm_group_label: CF patient and parents cohort in 3 CF center
arm_group.description: All adolescents for whom the transition to the adult center is scheduled within six months and their parent will be interviewed before and after transition.

intervention.intervention_name: semi structured interviews for all adolescents and their parent
intervention.description: Before and after transition, individual semi structured interviews will be recorded by one person in the same way in all CF center. And every interview will be transcribed by an other person
intervention.arm_group_label: CF patient and parents cohort in 3 CF center

study_pop.textblock: CF adolescent and their parents , for whom the transition to the adult center is scheduled within six months and witch have freely agreed to participate in the interviews their age will be between 17 and 23 years old. living followed in one of the 3 CF center

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- CF adolescent and their parents , for whom the transition to the adult center is scheduled within six months and witch have freely agreed to participate in the interviews
Exclusion Criteria:
